vscode-dapr.views.applications.name: Applications
An ID for your application, used for service discovery.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.appPor: The port your application is listening on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.comman: The command and arguments used to start your application.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.cwd.de: The directory in which to start Dapr.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.config: The path to the Dapr configuration file.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.enable: Whether to enable pprof profiling via an HTTP endpoint.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.grpcPo: The gRPC port for Dapr to listen on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.httpPo: The HTTP port for Dapr to listen on.
The image to build the code in (<repository>/<image>).
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.maxCon: Controls the concurrency level of the application.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.placem: The host on which the placement service resides.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.profil: The port for the profile server to listen on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.protoc: Tells Dapr to use HTTP or gRPC to talk to the application.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.redisH: The host on which the Redis service resides.
